Sentencas: The effects of activated carbon (AC) as an additive in multi-oxide nano composite LiNiCuZn-O for application as anode in solid oxide fuel cell (SOFC) is reported.
Titulo: The influence of activated carbon as an additive in anode materials for low temperature solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: The composite was synthesized using solid state reactions method with varying content of AC in range 0.1%-0.9% for use as anode in the cell.
Titulo: The influence of activated carbon as an additive in anode materials for low temperature solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: The cell was composed of the synthesized composite as anode, LiNiCuZn-O as cathode and Samaria doped ceria (SDC) as electrolyte.
Titulo: The influence of activated carbon as an additive in anode materials for low temperature solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: The prepared composites were characterized for morphology and crystal structure by scanning electron microscope (SEM) and x-ray diffraction (XRD) respectively.
Titulo: The influence of activated carbon as an additive in anode materials for low temperature solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: Furthermore, the crystallite sizes of LiNiCuZn-0 and LiNiCuZn-O with AC as an additive have been found in the range from 50 nm to 70 nm.
Titulo: The influence of activated carbon as an additive in anode materials for low temperature solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: The prepared composite materials were observed porous and the porosity of the sample having 0.5% additive was found highest.
Titulo: The influence of activated carbon as an additive in anode materials for low temperature solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: The conductivity and power density of the SOFC were studied at temperature of 600 degrees C.
Titulo: The influence of activated carbon as an additive in anode materials for low temperature solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: The maximum value of conductivity was found as 4.79 S/cm for the composite containing 0.5% AC as measured by using 4-probe method.
Titulo: The influence of activated carbon as an additive in anode materials for low temperature solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: The maximum value of power density of the fuel cell with anode comprising of 0.5% AC along with the mentioned cathode and the electrolyte was 455 mW/cm(2).
Titulo: The influence of activated carbon as an additive in anode materials for low temperature solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: Therefore, out of the compositions studied, the composite comprising of LiNiCuZn-O with 0.5% AC offered best performance for anode in the cell.
Titulo: The influence of activated carbon as an additive in anode materials for low temperature solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: This oxide composite is reported as a potential candidate for use as anode in low temperature SOFCs.
Titulo: The influence of activated carbon as an additive in anode materials for low temperature solid oxide fuel cells
